definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

pinyin: shu4 ju4 lian4 lu4 lian2 jie1 biao1 zhi4
luo2 ji5 lian4 lu4 kong4 zhi4

sentences.chinese: 更新和同步鏈路狀態數據庫。

sentences.english: Discovery algorithms usually go from high layer (IP layer) to low layer (data-link layer).
sentences.chinese: 拓撲發現算法的發現通常是從IP層到鏈路層。

sentences.english: Crossover functions may be implemented internally to a MAU or elsewhere in the twisted-pair link.
sentences.chinese: 交叉功能大多在MAU內或雙絞線鏈路中其他處實現。

sentences.english: The performance of any application is only as fast as the slowest link in the environment.
sentences.chinese: 任何應用程序的性能與環境中最慢的鏈路一樣快。

sentences.english: Server failed to initialize. Failed to run the server link manager.
sentences.chinese: 無法運行服務器鏈路管理器。

sentences.english: In addition, multi-circuit management makes communication more credibility.
sentences.chinese: 另外，多鏈路管理也使得通訊更加可靠。

sentences.english: These links represent the coarsest grained system boundaries mentioned earlier.
sentences.chinese: 這些鏈路代表前面提到的粗粒度系統邊界。

sentences.english: The CHG:SLK command is used to change the minor state of a signaling link.
sentences.chinese: slk命令用於更改信令鏈路的次級狀態。

sentences.english: This IE indicates the maximum and guaranteed bit rates of a GBR bearer for downlink and uplink.
sentences.chinese: 該IE指示上行鏈路和下行鏈路的最大保證速率。

sentences.english: This IE indicates the maximum and guaranteed bit rates of a GBR bearer for downlink and uplink.
sentences.chinese: 該IE指示上行鏈路和下行鏈路的最大保證速率。

sentences.english: From the drop-down box, you can select the link aggregation device we created in the previous step.
sentences.chinese: 可以從下拉框中選擇前面創建的鏈路聚合設備。

sentences.english: The first chart is labeled "uplink reflected off the moon".
sentences.chinese: 第一個圖表標着“月球反射的上行鏈路”。

sentences.english: HSV is adept at penetrating the dermis and reaching the nerve pathways.
sentences.chinese: 單純皰疹病毒很熟練地穿透皮膚並進入神經鏈路。

sentences.english: The common link of networked application environments is the network itself.
sentences.chinese: 網絡連接的應用程序環境的常見鏈路是網絡本身。

sentences.english: Above the link layer is the network layer, which is responsible for directing packets to their destinations.
sentences.chinese: 鏈路層上面是網絡層，它負責將報文定向到目標位置。
